humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, there is one sentinel lymph node (out of 2 assessed) that is positive for metastatic carcinoma. This corresponds to N1 stage based on the AJCC staging system and the new rules provided. The other sentinel lymph node and the non-sentinel tissue were found to be benign. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient was found to have metastatic carcinoma in one out of one sentinel lymph node (1/1) with a metastatic focus measuring 0.3 cm and extranodal extension identified. This indicates a pathologic N1 stage.
